directions: Combine cooked rice mix with the black-eyed peas, red onion, green pepper, crabmeat, parsley, lemon juice, olive oil, hot sauce, salt, and black pepper in a large bowl. Serve with tomato slices.
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups cooked long grain and wild rice mix
1 (15 ounce) can black-eyed peas, rinsed and drained
1/2 cup finely chopped green bell pepper
1/2 pound fresh crabmeat, picked over for cartilage and shell fragments
1 dash hot pepper sauce, or to taste
title: Hoppin' John in the Summertime
